Name: Luminescence
About the game: 'Let's make a deal, if you can prove that urban legend is a lie, I won't bother you anymore.' Rena is annoying student. She always show up wherever Ady is. Until one day, they make a deal. If Ady can prove that urban legend is a lie, she promise to leave Ady alone. Luminescence is a short visual novel.
